title: What token do You use?
answer: Our NFT’s are all stored as ERC-721 tokens

title: What’s the blockchain You use?
answer: We use Polygon Blockchain. Same security, same scalability, but less gas fees for You

title: Is the metaverse game going to be in pixel?
answer: No, the game is being built on a third-party engine (Unreal Engine) in a 3D style, connected to blockchain with help of smart contracts

title: Why do you do it?
answer: We’re building a project where its community strives to implement blockchain tehnology into day-to-day life.
